about.title: About
about.subtitle: Discover who I am and what I do

description.content:
As a passionate developer, I've always had an attraction to computers in general, dedicating each day to learning and improving my knowledge and skills. My interest in programming goes beyond web development, with a particular passion for game development and creating mods for RedM servers.

Outside of coding, I'm passionate about combat sports, cycling, and airsoft. Cinema and TV series also hold an important place in my life.
I'm also a competitor at heart, whether in gaming/esports or in my sports activities. This competitive mindset helps me to always seek improvement and push my limits, whether in development or in my personal passions.

interests.title: Interests
interests.subtitle: What I'm passionate about beyond code

gaming.title: Gaming & E-sports
gaming.description: Passionate about video games and competition, I always strive to improve my skills to play at the top level.

tech.title: New Technologies
tech.description: Always on the lookout for the latest technological innovations and new frameworks.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Whether it's development, video games, or sports, I love learning and always seek to progress.

gamedev.title: Game Dev
gamedev.description: Game development is a field that I'm passionate about and want to explore further. Currently creating mods for RedM servers, but I plan to create my own projects.

sports.title: Sports
sports.description: I've practiced several sports since my youth, including various combat sports (Muay Thai, Jiu-jitsu, Viet Vo Dao), cycling, and airsoft.

cinema.title: Cinema
cinema.description: I really enjoy cinema, especially TV series. The series that have marked me are Breaking Bad, Mr Robot, and the Dexter universe.

items.title: FullStack Developer

items.title: UI/UX Modder and Developer

items.title: Management of a RedM Community Server
items.description: I'm working on a community server project on RedM, currently under development. I manage all the modding and UI/UX development.
